example: I use my laptop to work from home.
logic: LAP (大腿) + TOP (上面) - 放在腿上用的电脑

example: The desktop in my office has a large screen.
logic: DESK (桌面) + TOP - 放在桌子上的电脑

example: Electronics such as smartphones are widely used.
logic: 基于电子 (ELECTRON) 技术的产品总称

example: He lost his mobile phone during the trip.
logic: MOB (移动) - 可随身移动的电话

example: I downloaded a new application to help with my studies.
logic: AP (去) + PLY (重叠/折叠) - 把功能应用到具体场景

example: This rule applies to all employees, regardless of position.
logic: 将规则“贴合”到对象身上

example: I forgot the password and couldn't unlock my phone.
logic: UN (相反) + LOCK (锁) - 解除锁定

example: Please lock the door before you leave.
logic: 封闭或固定装置

example: She reminded me to bring my passport to the airport.
logic: RE (再次) + MIND (头脑) - 让事情再次回到脑海

example: I reminded him to complete the assignment before the deadline.
logic: 促使某人记住一个动作

example: The song reminded her of her childhood.
logic: 通过 A 联想到 B

example: I can't recall his name, but I recognise his face.
logic: RE (回) + CALL (呼唤) - 在脑中呼唤过去的记忆

example: I'm still in contact with my old colleagues.
logic: CON (共同) + TACT (触碰) - 相互接触

example: She’s in touch with her family while studying abroad.
logic: 感官上的“触碰”，引申为沟通

example: The lunar eclipse was visible from many parts of the world.
logic: 源自罗马月亮女神 Luna

example: The artist received a commission to paint a portrait.
logic: COM (共同) + MISS (送) - 共同派发的任务或费用

example: They decided to go safari in Africa.
logic: 源自斯瓦希里语“旅行” - 特指野生动物观察

example: I prepared some slides for the presentation.
logic: 原指手动“滑动”切换的透明片

example: He declined the invitation to the wedding.
logic: DE (向下) + CLINE (倾斜) - 态度向下，即为拒绝

example: Please notify me when the meeting starts.
logic: NOT (知道) + IFY (使) - 使他人知道某事

example: The fabric has a beautiful floral pattern.
logic: 源自 PATER (父亲) - 作为“原型”或“样板”的重复

example: My phone started to vibrate when I received the message.
logic: 快速的往复运动

example: Turn up the volume so we can hear.
logic: VOL (卷/转) - 原指卷轴的大小，引申为量级

example: Please mute your microphone.
logic: 沉默不语的状态

example: Press the button to start the machine.
logic: 原指衣服上的扣子，引申为按压开关

example: I didn't mean to disturb you.
logic: TURB (搅动) - 使他人平静的状态被搅乱

example: In case of an emergency, call 911.
logic: E (出) + MERGE (没入) - 突然冒出来的突发状况

example: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
logic: 从遮挡物中显露出来

example: I turned on the DND mode.
logic: 拒绝一切外界“搅动”

example: The battery of my phone is dead.
logic: BATT (打击) - 原指一组排列好的大炮，引申为电池组

example: I need to charge my phone.
logic: 原意为“装载”，给电池装载电力

example: The vehicle was parked outside.
logic: VEH (携带/运送) - 载人的交通工具

example: He owns a luxury automobile.
logic: AUTO (自动) + MOB (移动) - 自动移动的机器

example: Make sure to update the software.
logic: UP (向上) + DATE (日期) - 将日期提升到最新

example: She specializes in the craft of pottery.
logic: 需要技巧和力量完成的工作

example: The hotel provides a shuttle service.
logic: 像织布机的“梭子”一样往返穿梭

example: The submarine dived deep into the ocean.
logic: SUB (在下面) + MAR (海) - 在海面下的船

example: He decided to let it slide.
logic: 让错误像在冰上一样“滑过去”，不计较
